# [Interview #653: LOC Signing Report - Keith Casner, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=653#3)

#### Robert Jordan

I told him Asmodean was my favorite character, and he said "Oh, I would have thought Semirhage."

#### KEITH CASNER

Yow! The Creator takes me for an inhumanly cruel guy on first sightâ€”I need to change my image.
